thread.section_title: Hotel Wales - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely old hotel, perfect location, nice staff.
thread.title_full: Lovely old hotel, perfect location, nice staff. - Review of Hotel Wales, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Mary Margaret G
title: Lovely old hotel, perfect location, nice staff.
text:
stayed in an especially pretty corner room/suite. enjoyed being able to walk to everything, from museums to great restaurants. the staff are lovely and always willing to provide good service. would go back to this hotel any time!
Room Tip: higher rooms have less traffic noise at night. corner rooms are lovely. See more room tips
